QuestData.Title: Rearmament
QuestData.Description:
The people of this valley have true hearts, $n. They're eager to take back control of their home.
We have to help them.
The Brineworks up the road from here supplies most of House Stormsong's weapons. Our movement here could make great use of them.
If you can collect enough to go around, I'll go over some basic training with our friends here.
QuestData.CompletionText: There are still many who don't follow Lord Stormsong. We need to stand by them.
QuestData.RewardText: This valley belongs to its people. We must fight to make it whole again!
